titles: An exhortation to styrre all Englyshe men to the defence of theyr countreye. made by Richard Morysine
author: Morison, Richard, Sir, d. 1556.
publisher: In aedibus Thome Bertheleti typis impress. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,
